common_filenames.description: favicon.ico - File used to store a small website logo that may appear in various areas of a web browser, including the address bar, website bookmark , and webpage tab . If a website has a favicon image, it will appear to the left of the web address when any page of the website is loaded. The favicon.ico image file must be 16x16 pixels and stored in the root directory of the website in order for the web browser to recognize it.
